trans-unit.source: Represents a polyline annotation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation"></xref> class.
This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value.
Gets the annotation type.
For internal use, should not be used.
The annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
`True` to release both unmanaged and managed resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets or sets the style of an anchor cap at the end of the annotation line.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> value that represents the style used for an anchor cap located at the end of an annotation line.
Ends the user placement of a polyline annotation.
This method ends an annotation placement operation previously started by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BeginPlacement%2A> method call.
You are not required to call this method, because placement will automatically end when an end user enters all required points.
However, it is useful when an annotation placement operation needs to be aborted for some reason.
This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object.
This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the polyline annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
Gets or sets the path points of a polyline annotation at run time.
A polyline must use coordinates relative to an annotation object, where (0,0) denotes the top-left coordinates and (100,100) denotes the bottom-right coordinates of the annotation.
This property is not accessible at design time, when you should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation.GraphicsPathPoints%2A> property instead.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation.GraphicsPath"></xref> object with the polyline shape.
Gets or sets the path points of the polyline annotation at design time.
A polyline must use coordinates relative to an annotation object, where (0,0) denotes the top-left coordinates and (100,100) denotes the bottom-right coordinates of the annotation.
This property is not accessible at run time, when you should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation.GraphicsPath%2A> property instead.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPointCollection"></xref> object with the polyline shape.
Gets or sets a flag that determines whether an annotation should be placed using the free-draw mode.
Two different placement modes are supported when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BeginPlacement%2A> method is called.

Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation.IsFreeDrawPlacement%2A> property to `true` to switch from the default mode to free-draw mode, which allows the user to free draw while moving the mouse cursor.
To allow the user to free draw the annotation, you must also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AllowPathEditing%2A> property to `true`.
`True` if an annotation should be placed using free-draw mode, otherwise `false`.
The default value is `false`.
Gets or sets a style for the anchor cap at the start of the annotation line.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle"></xref> value that represents the style for an anchor cap located at the start of an annotation line.
Gets or sets the text style of an annotation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.PolylineAnnotation.TextStyle"></xref> value used to draw the text of an annotation.
